00020 #include "delay.h"
00021 
00025 void delay_ms(unsigned char ms)
00026 {
00027    unsigned short delay_count = F_CPU / 4000;
00028 #ifdef __GNUC__
00029     unsigned short cnt;
00030     __asm__ __volatile__ ("\n"
00031                   "L_dl1%=:\n\t"
00032                   "mov %A0, %A2\n\t"
00033                   "mov %B0, %B2\n"
00034                   "L_dl2%=:\n\t"
00035                   "sbiw %A0, 1\n\t"
00036                   "brne L_dl2%=\n\t"
00037                   "dec %1\n\t" "brne L_dl1%=\n\t":"=&w" (cnt)
00038                   :"r"(ms), "r"((unsigned short) (delay_count))
00039         );
00040 #else
00041     unsigned short delay_cnt = F_CPU/6000;
00042     //unsigned short delay_cnt = 2400;   //*KU* for 14.745600 MHz Clock
00043     unsigned short delay_cnt_buffer;
00044 
00045     while (ms--) {
00046         delay_cnt_buffer = delay_cnt;
00047         while (delay_cnt_buffer--);
00048     }
00049 #endif
00050 }
00051 
00055 void delay_s(unsigned char s)
00056 {
00057         for (unsigned char i=0;i<s;i++)
00058         {
00059                 delay_ms(250);
00060                 delay_ms(250);
00061                 delay_ms(250);
00062                 delay_ms(250);
00063         }
00064 }
